page.title: 03Vauxhall
page.content: { The past few years} have seen changes in Vauxhall. Our neighbourhood, once packed with housing, crammed with life and with employment for most adults, presents a different picture today. { Many factories,}including Tate & Lyle sugar refinery and the BXL plastics manufacturers, have closed down. { Much of the old housing}is demolished and the rest is being modernised. This was necessary because the old houses were damp, had cracks in walls and ceilings and were infested with rats, mice and cockroaches. The vermin were from the sugar refinery's buildings. { Because of unemployment and poor {housing} many of our school friends have now moved away. We are looking forward to being rehoused in this area as there are exciting plans by our community to develop the Tate & Lyle site for housing and leisure.
